channel.title: CVE Feed for Qualcomm, Inc. -- Snapdragon IoT, Snapdragon Mobile
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Qualcomm, Inc. -- Snapdragon IoT, Snapdragon Mobile

item.title: CVE-2017-14913|2024-09-16T17:27:39.259Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20iot%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile
item.description: In Android before 2018-01-05 on Qualcomm Snapdragon IoT, Snapdragon Mobile MDM9206, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 835, SD 845, DDR address input validation is being improperly truncated.

item.title: CVE-2017-14906|2024-09-16T16:42:29.142Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20iot%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile
item.description: In Android before 2018-01-05 on Qualcomm Snapdragon IoT, Snapdragon Mobile MDM9206, MDM9607, MSM8909W, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 410/12, PKCS7 padding is not supported by the crypto storage APIs.
